member.name: IWICBitmapLock.GetDataPointer
member.summary: Gets the pointer to the top left pixel in the locked rectangle.
member.param: A pointer that receives the size of the buffer.
A pointer that receives a pointer to the top left pixel in the locked rectangle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapLock.GetPixelFormat
member.summary: Gets the pixel format of for the locked area of pixels. This can be used to compute the number of bytes-per-pixel in the locked area.
member.param: A pointer that receives the pixel format GUID of the locked area.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapLock.GetSize
member.summary: Retrieves the width and height, in pixels, of the locked rectangle.
member.param: A pointer that receives the width of the locked rectangle.
A pointer that receives the height of the locked rectangle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
